alert.note: Alert for Winnebago (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 27 at 11:12PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calumet and southern Winnebago Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1112 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oshkosh, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Central Lake Winnebago and Northern Lake Winnebago around 1135 PM CDT. Chilton and St Anna around 1155 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Pickett, Killsnake Wildlife Area, Butte Des Morts, Lake Butte Des Morts, Jericho, Rivermoor, Charlesburg, Brothertown, Winneconne and Harbor Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
